PartOfSpeech: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
ExampleJA: いまそれを直そうったって無駄だ
ExampleEN: It's no use trying to fix it now.
MeaningEN: to repair; to mend; to fix; to correct (a mistake, bad habit, etc.); to put right; to restore; to straighten (e.g. a tie); to tidy up (one's hair, make-up, etc.); to revive (one's spirits)
